nodes.text: Ossberry ale was a type of ale that had a bluish color. Jacen Solo, and his sister Jaina Solo drank some Ossbery Ale while they were on the ship Tradewyn. They were having a meal with Aryn Dro Thul, her son Raynar, and Raynar's uncle Tyko Thul while discussing the disappearance of Raynar's father, Bornan.
